footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Aloy | Update Date: 03/04/2023 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Aqua Simulacra__
High value for fast nukes.
__Stringless__
A good 4-star option if you can ensure that her Elemental Burst is Melted.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Elegy for the End, Skyward Harp, Stringless, Viridescent Hunt, Windblume Ode, Mouun's Moon, Alley Hunter, Predetor, Blackcliff Warbow, Polar Star, Hunter's Path, King's Squire, Prototype Crescent

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Prophecies of Dawn
**2)** Elemental Skill: Frozen Wilds
**3)** Normal Attack: Rapid Fire

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Normal Attack talent does not have to be raised at all for this build.

Almost all Bows work at similar levels, with Elemental Mastery bows with Melt performing for higher damage.

footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Aloy | Update Date: 08/10/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Polar Star, Skyward Harp, Prototype Crescent, Amos Bow, Rust

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%  |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Rapid Fire
**2)** Elemental Burst: Prophecies of Dawn
**3)** Elemental Skill: Frozen Wilds

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: On-Field DPS build is based around gaining Coil Stacks and using her Normal Attack string on a frozen enemy. When played with Cryo resonance and Blizzard Strayer, CRIT Rate can be quite low.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: Favonius Warbow, Elegy for the End

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus %  |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Prophecies of Dawn
**2)** Elemental Skill: Frozen Wilds
**3)** Normal Attack: Rapid Fire

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
Normal Attack talents can be ignored for this build.
The instructor set cannot be used if there are no reactions being triggered, aim for Energy Recharge on the substats to utilize the Noblesse Oblige set buff. CRIT Rate will have to be decently high to use the Favonius Bow passive.
